body_html:
I have the same issue after adding Android NDK to the WORKSPACE.
It happened to me after syncing my tensorflow directory with cd53f3c change number 109591880 that apparently load pthread shared library after building it through the top level build flow. (related to issue #419)
body_text:
I have the same issue after adding Android NDK to the WORKSPACE.
It happened to me after syncing my tensorflow directory with cd53f3c change number 109591880 that apparently load pthread shared library after building it through the top level build flow. (related to issue #419)
body:
I have the same issue after adding Android NDK to the `WORKSPACE`.
It happened to me after syncing my tensorflow directory with cd53f3c3302c9312c1840389a9988a879b8b9dd5 change number 109591880 that apparently load `pthread` shared library after building it through the top level build flow. (related to issue #419)
